title: owncloud damaged after the system crashed
body:
i run the actual public owncloud client for mac under os 10.8.5. 
everytime my system crashed i just can see this: http://s1.directupload.net/images/131025/zeq82ngh.png
the sync stops and wont continue also after a restart of the system.

log
-----
10-25 12:36:51:594 csync_update: journal: /volumes/153gb/.csync_journal.db
10-25 12:36:51:594 _csync_statedb_check: database size is zero byte!
10-25 12:36:51:595 csync_statedb_load: err: failed to copy statedb -> statedb_tmp - bail out.
10-25 12:36:51:595  #### error during  csync_update :  "csync konnte die state db nicht laden." 
10-25 12:36:51:595 csync run took  1  milliseconds 
10-25 12:36:51:619 -> csync finished slot for "153gbvolume" with error true 
10-25 12:36:51:620 sync is enabled - starting the polltimer again. 
10-25 12:36:51:621 starting event logging again in  2000  milliseconds 
10-25 12:36:51:622 oo folder slotsyncfinished: result:  2 
10-25 12:36:51:622   ** error strings:  ("csync konnte die state db nicht laden.") 
10-25 12:36:51:623     * owncloud csync thread finished with error 
----

everything i can do is delete and recreate everything that it has to start from the very beginningâ€¦

therefore i have to start a sync of 80  gb again and again and i am not able to finish it if it stops working after a crash.

is the error already known?
